p: Prior research has estimated and evaluated the carbon balancing of HWPs globally [ 8], in EU countries [ 9], and in specific countries such as the United States [ 10], Canada [ 11, 12], Portugal [ 13], and Slovekia [ 14]. Other studies have conducted an integrated carbon balance assessment of forests and HWPs worldwide [ 15, 16] and in the United States [ 17, 18], Canada [ 19â€“ 21], Germany [ 22], France [ 23], Finland [ 24], Switzerland [ 25], and China [ 26].
